name: Agrowth The Age
description:
Here's my submission for the "My First Game Jam : Winter 2023"

The rules ? Two weeks to make a game with the theme of "Growth"

Your goal is to make every plant growing and for this, you have three different characters : with the baby, you can access to small tunnels, the man can run, jump and climb to vines and the old man can make vines and plants growing

Commands :

A & D : MOVE

W & S : CLIMB

SPACE : JUMP

SHIFT : SWITCH CHARACTER

ESCAPE : PAUSE

F : INTERACT

Credits :

Tileset ► https://adamatomic.itch.io/cavernas

Man ► https://pixelmetaldude.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-adventure-character

Old Man ► https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-town

SFX ► https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx
